verses.verse: And the <S%H8269>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> also <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3027>parts<s%> to dwell in other <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men,<s%> that willingly offered <S%H5068>themselves<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H4082>province<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> but in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H272>possession<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> to wit, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H5411>Nethinims,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> certain of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%> Of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H6265>Athaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4111>Mahalaleel,<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H6557>Perez;<s%>

And <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1263>Baruch,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3626>Col-hozeh,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2382>Hazaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3114>Joiarib,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7888>Shiloni.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> <S%H5543>Sallu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3133>Joed,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6305>Pedaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6964>Kolaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H384>Ithiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3470>Jesaiah.<s%>
And <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H1373>Gabbai,<s%> <S%H5543>Sallai,<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>

And <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%> was their <S%H6496>overseer:<s%> <S%H5921><s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5574>Senuah<s%> was <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
Of <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3114>Joiarib,<s%> <S%H3199>Jachin.<s%>

Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> was the <S%H5057>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And their <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two:<s%> and <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6421>Pelaliah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H557>Amzi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashur,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchiah,<s%>

And his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two:<s%> and <S%H6023>Amashai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5832>Azareel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H273>Ahasai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemoth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer,<s%>

And their <S%H251>brethren,<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight:<s%> and their <S%H6496>overseer<s%> <S%H5921><s%> was <S%H2068>Zabdiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of one of the <S%H1419>great<s%> men.

Also <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2815>Hashub,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5840>Azrikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1138>Bunni;<s%>

And <S%H7678>Shabbethai<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> of the <S%H4480>chief<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> had the <S%H5921>oversight<s%> of the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4318>Micha,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> was the <S%H7218>principal<s%> to <S%H8462>begin<s%> the <S%H3034>thanksgiving<s%> in <S%H8605>prayer:<s%> and <S%H1229>Bakbukiah<s%> the <S%H4932>second<s%> among his <S%H4480>brethren,<s%> <S%H251><s%> and <S%H5653>Abda<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8051>Shammua,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1559>Galal,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H702>four.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H7778>porters,<s%> <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> <S%H2929>Talmon,<s%> and their <S%H251>brethren<s%> that <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> were a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>

And the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> were in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
But the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H6077>Ophel:<s%> and <S%H6727>Ziha<s%> and <S%H1658>Gispa<s%> were <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5411>Nethinims.<s%>

The <S%H6496>overseer<s%> also of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> was <S%H5813>Uzzi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4983>Mattaniah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Micha.<s%> Of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> the <S%H7891>singers<s%> were <S%H5048>over<s%> the <S%H4399>business<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it was the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> them, that a certain <S%H548>portion<s%> should be <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H1697>due<s%> for every <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>

And <S%H6611>Pethahiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4898>Meshezabeel,<s%> of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> was at the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1697>matters<s%> concerning the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H413>for<s%> the <S%H2691>villages,<s%> with their <S%H7704>fields,<s%> some of the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H7153>Kirjath-arba,<s%> and in the <S%H2691>villages<s%> thereof, and at <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and in the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, and at <S%H3343>Jekabzeel,<s%> and in the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof,
And at <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> and at <S%H4137>Moladah,<s%> and at <S%H1046>Beth-phelet,<s%>
And at <S%H2705>Hazar-shual,<s%> and at <S%H884>Beer-sheba,<s%> and in the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof,
And at <S%H6860>Ziklag,<s%> and at <S%H4368>Mekonah,<s%> and in the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof,
And at <S%H5884>En-rimmon,<s%> and at <S%H6881>Zareah,<s%> and at <S%H3412>Jarmuth,<s%>

Zanoah, <S%H2182><s%> <S%H5725>Adullam,<s%> and in their <S%H2691>villages,<s%> at <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and the <S%H7704>fields<s%> thereof, at <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> and in the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof. And they <S%H2583>dwelt<s%> from <S%H4480>Beer-sheba<s%> <S%H884><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> also of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> from <S%H4480>Geba<s%> <S%H1387><s%> dwelt at <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> and <S%H5857>Aija,<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and in their <S%H1323>villages,<s%>
And at <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> <S%H5011>Nob,<s%> <S%H6055>Ananiah,<s%>
Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> <S%H1664>Gittaim,<s%>
Hadid, <S%H2307><s%> <S%H6650>Zeboim,<s%> <S%H5041>Neballat,<s%>
Lod, <S%H3850><s%> and <S%H207>Ono,<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2798>craftsmen.<s%>
And <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H4256>divisions<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
